options -->\n</form>\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<script>\nvar appmateSelectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n  var shop = Appmate.wk.globals.shop;\n  var product = Appmate.wk.getProduct(variant.product_id);\n  var itemId = $(selector.variantIdField).parents('[data-wk-item]').attr('data-wk-item');\n  var container = $('#wk-item-' + itemId);\n  if (variant) {\n    Appmate.wk.updateItem(itemId, {selected_variant_id: variant.id});\n  }\n  var imageUrl = '';\n  if (variant && variant.image) {\n    imageUrl = Appmate.wk.filters.img_url(variant, 'large');\n  } else if (product) {\n    imageUrl = Appmate.wk.filters.img_url(product, 'large');\n  }\n  if (imageUrl) {\n    container.find('.wk-variant-image').attr('src', imageUrl);\n  }\n  var formatMoney = Appmate.wk.filters.money;\n  if (variant && (variant.available || variant.inventory_policy === 'continue')) {\n    container.find('.wk-add-to-cart').removeAttr('disabled').removeClass('disabled').attr('value', 'Add to cart');\n    if(variant.price < variant.compare_at_price){\n      container.find('.wk-price-preview').html(formatMoney(variant.price) + \" <del>\" + formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price) + \"</del>\");\n    } else {\n      container.find('.wk-price-preview').html(formatMoney(variant.price));\n    }\n  } else {\n    container.find('.wk-add-to-cart').addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').attr('value', 'Sold Out');\n    var message = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Unavailable\";\n    container.find('.wk-price-preview').text(message);\n  }\n};\nfunction appmateOptionSelect(el){\n  if (!Shopify || !Shopify.OptionSelectors) {\n    throw new Error('Missing option_selection.js! Please check templates/page.wishlist.liquid');\n  }\n  var id = el.getAttribute('id');\n  var itemId = $(el).parents('[data-wk-item]').attr('data-wk-item');\n  var container = $('#wk-item-' + itemId);\n  Appmate.wk.getItem(itemId).then(function(product){\n    var selector = new Shopify.OptionSelectors(id, {\n      product: product,\n      onVariantSelected: appmateSelectCallback,\n      enableHistoryState: false\n    });\n    if (product.selected_variant_id) {\n      selector.selectVariant(product.selected_variant_id);\n    }\n    // Add label if only one product option and it isn't 'Title'.\n    if (product.options.length == 1 && product.options[0] != 'Title') {\n      $(container)\n      .find('.selector-wrapper:eq(0)')\n      .prepend('<label>' + product.options[0] + '</label>');\n    }\n  });\n}\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n  \n    <script src=\"//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0407/7545/t/24/assets/jquery.mThumbnailScroller.js?13584109604295032457\" soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', selectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8862636552 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n                    $(element).attr('src', new_image_src);\n\n                    $('.thumbnail[data-image-id=\"' + variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n    <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n        $(function() selectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8573429064 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8574221832 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n                    $(element).attr('src', new_image_src);\n\n                    $('.thumbnail[data-image-id=\"' + variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n    <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n        $(function() {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', Product form requirement\n        selectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8708653896 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n                    $(element).attr('src', new_image_src);\n\n                    $('.thumbnail[data-image-id=\"' + variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <div class=\"rte\">BEIGE CANVAS BAG</div>\n\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8959976648 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n    <script type=\"text/javascript\">\n        $(function() selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8859465736 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, selectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8853445896 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n                    $(element).attr('src', new_image_src);\n\n                    $('.thumbnail[data-image-id=\"' + variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <div class=\"rte\">Material: Metal Size: 50-20-140 Shape: round Target: Unisex Colors: Matt black, shiny black; Sun Lenses: grey flash selectCallback = function(variant, selector) {\n            var $product = $('#product-' + selector.product.id);\n            if (variant && variant.available == true) {\n                if(variant.compare_at_price > variant.price){\n                    $('.was', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.compare_at_price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')))\n                } else {\n                    $('.was', $product).text('')\n                }\n                $('span.product-price', $product).html(Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')));\n\n                if($('.add', $product).data(\"preorder\") == 1){\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Pre-Order');\n                } else {\n                    $('.add', $product).removeClass('disabled').removeAttr('disabled').val('Add to Cart');\n                }\n\n\n                $(\".sold_out_label\").remove();\n            } else {\n                var soldOutMessage = Shopify.formatMoney(variant.price, $('form', $product).data('money-format')) + \"<span class='sold_out_label'>Sold Out</span>\";\n\n                var message = variant ? soldOutMessage : messageLabel;\n                var messageLabel = variant ? \"Sold Out\" : \"Sold Out\";\n\n\n\n                $('.was', $product).text('');\n                $('.product-price', $product).html(message);\n                $('.add', $product).addClass('disabled').attr('disabled', 'disabled').val(messageLabel);\n            }\n\n\n            if (variant && variant.featured_image) {\n                var original_image = $(\".bigimage-8853426504 img\"), new_image = variant.featured_image;\n                Shopify.Image.switchImage(new_image, original_image[0], function (new_image_src, original_image, element) {\n                    $(element).attr('src', new_image_src);\n\n                    $('.thumbnail[data-image-id=\"' + variant.featured_image.id + '\"]').trigger('click');\n\n                    \n                });\n            }\n        };\n</script>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <div class=\"rte\">Material: Metal Size: 50-20-140 Shape: drop Target: Unisex Colors: Shiny palladium, shiny striped grey; Sun Lenses:
